text: 1. One of the primary particles agglomerated nanosheeet nickel cobalt lithium manganate precursor, nickel cobalt lithium manganate precursor is of the formula NixCoyMnz(OH)2, wherein x + y + z=1, and the 0.5 ≤ x ≤ 0.9, characterized in, nickel cobalt lithium manganate precursor inside the crystal growth direction as the hexagonal nanosheeet accumulate, the hexagonal nanosheeet side lengths of 200-500 nm, a thickness of 70-200 nm; the hexagonal nanosheeet agglomerated secondary particles has a particle size D10 ≥ 6 µm, the hexagonal nanosheeet agglomerated secondary particles have a particle size D50=9-15 μm, the hexagonal nanosheeet agglomerated secondary particles have a particle size D90 ≤ 30 µm.
